title: My screen is black vibrates and led torch flickers on ,very hot no damage
content:
As new pixel 3a Xl
Stopped responding whilst watching YouTube,
Screen now black no image,vibrates and led flickers on and off ,phone heats up very fas
Tried hard rebooting no avail
No water damage or physical damage
Had screen protector on and case just in case
Tried cleaning sensors no fix
Phone is immaculate no scratches or anything
